CustomField.description: Calculates the total number of days the case was open
CustomField.formula: IF ( RecordType.Name = 'WCA' || RecordType.Name = 'Garment' , ( Case_Closed_Date__c - Date_of_Docket__c ) / 1440 , ( Case_Closed_Date__c - Date_Case_Received__c ) / 1440 )
CustomField.label: Total Duration of Case
